content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Data443 Announces the Launch of Global Privacy Manager, Revolutionary Privacy Compliance  Consumer Loss Mitigation Saas Technology February 19, 2020 First to Focus on True Cost of Privacy Compliance for Organizations Consumer Consent and Communications Loss Mitigation Platform Leverages Over 30,000 Active Organizations Usage and Industry Leading ClassiDocs Data Classification Product RALEIGH, N.C., Feb. 19, 2020  Data443 Risk Mitigation, Inc., OTCPK ATDS a leading data security and privacy software company, today announced the launch of its Global Privacy Manager, the industrys only end-to-end privacy compliance, governance and consumer loss-mitigation platform. The SaaS-only, deployed in minutes offering, will be open to privacy-focused retail and ecommerce businesses who have struggled to maintain their privacy compliance posture. Adding onto our existing 30,000 GDPR Framework clients  powered by our leading enterprise grade technologies such as ClassiDocs, ArcMail, ARALOC and others to come  were very excited to offer this for all other privacy-centric frameworks such as the CCPA, PIPEDA and LGPD. said Jason Remillard, CEO and founder of Data443. Our years of in-depth experience in this market has taught us that marketers and business owners of all sizes want to be privacy centric and compliant  but also dont want to destroy or lose their material investment in customer relationships. Being cognizant of this, responsible in the privacy relationship and having a different approach towards consent, opt-in, and ongoing stewardship of these facets  all while keeping in compliance with changing laws backs up our research for success. Data443s Global Privacy Manger is built on the ClassiDocs award winning data classification platform and Data443s WordPress GDPR Framework, which is currently powering more than 30,000 businesses worldwide for the EUs GDPR Privacy Law. The combined platform automatically searches the data residing in cloud application, databases, servers, and endpoints used by businesses to discover, classify and map customer data. Its out-of-the-box workflows are easily tailored to fit the size and scope of any business and include automated processes to save time and confirm compliance. At its foundation, Global Privacy Manager focuses on creating the customers privacy experience. Its full privacy portal, customizable consent management and simple reporting create a one-stop location for customers to manage their privacy rights, allowing for a seamless transition between submitting a Subject Access Request SAR, the business classifying and mapping and discovering privacy data, and reporting back to the customer. By their nature, laws and regulations set the minimum acceptable standard. But providing the bare minimum never leads to a quality experience for the customer, said Remillard. We are offering an initial early adopters program that will allow us to onboard clients who are just starting to test the waters with privacy compliance efforts  regardless of which one  and receive a fully branded, customizable, personalized experience within minutes to demonstrate the platform capabilities and value statement. For more information, including scheduling a demo for your business, please visit  About Data443 Risk Mitigation, Inc. Data443 Risk Mitigation, Inc. OTCPK ATDS, is an industry leader in the data security and privacy business, providing software and services to enable secure data across local devices, network, cloud, and databases, at rest and in flight. Its suite of products and services is highlighted by i ArcMail, which is a leading provider of simple, secure and cost-effective email and enterprise archiving and management solutions ii ARALOC, which is a market leading secure, cloud-based platform for the management, protection and distribution of digital content to the desktop and mobile devices, which protects an organizations confidential content and intellectual property assets from leakage  malicious or accidental  without impacting collaboration between all stakeholders iii ClassiDocs, the Companys award-winning data classification and governance technology, which supports CCPA, LGPD and GDPR compliance iv ClassiDocs for Blockchain, which provides an active implementation for the Ripple XRP that protects blockchain transactions from inadvertent disclosure and data leaks v Data443 Global Privacy Manager, the privacy compliance and consumer loss mitigation platform which is integrated with ClassiDocs to do the delivery portions of GDPR and CCPA as well as process Data Privacy Access Requests  removal request  with inventory by ClassiDocs vi Data443 Protect, which provides nearly instant Cloud-deployed Data Loss Prevention capabilities with false positive rates unmatched enabled by ClassiDocs vii Data443 Virtual Data Protection Officer program that offers a turnkey and outsourced DPO capability for smaller organizations viii DATAEXPRESS, the leading Data transport, transformation and delivery product trusted by leading financial organizations worldwide ix the WordPress GDPR Framework with over 30,000 active users enables organizations of all sizes to comply with the GDPR and other privacy frameworks. analysis:
**Analysis of Data443's Global Privacy Manager Press Release**

**1. Key Security Features and Their Benefits to Users:**

- **Automated Data Discovery and Classification:** The platform automatically searches across cloud applications, databases, servers, and endpoints to discover, classify, and map customer data. This feature ensures that organizations can quickly identify sensitive information and apply appropriate protection measures, reducing the risk of data breaches.

- **Compliance Framework Support:** The Global Privacy Manager supports multiple privacy frameworks such as GDPR, CCPA, PIPEDA, and LGPD. This allows organizations to maintain compliance with various regulations efficiently, avoiding legal penalties and enhancing trust with customers.

- **Customizable Consent Management:** The platform offers customizable consent management, enabling organizations totailor consent collection to their specific needs. This feature ensures transparency and compliance with regulations like GDPR and CCPA, while also providing a better user experience.

- **Privacy Portal:** A full privacy portal allows customers to manage their privacy rights seamlessly, including submitting Subject Access Requests (SARs). This one-stop solution simplifies the process for both businesses and their customers, ensuring compliance and improving customer satisfaction.

- **Automated Workflows:** Out-of-the-box, easily customizable workflows automate processes such as data classification, mapping, and reporting. These workflows save time, reduce human error, and ensure ongoing compliance with evolving privacy laws.

- **Data Loss Prevention (DLP):** The platform includes strong DLP capabilities, powered by ClassiDocs, to prevent unauthorized data leakage. This protects sensitive information from both malicious and accidental disclosure.

- **Integration with ClassiDocs:** Built on Data443’s award-winning ClassiDocs data classification platform, the Global Privacy Manager leverages proven technology to deliver robust data governance and compliance capabilities.

**2. Compliance Certifications and Regulatory Adherence:**

- **GDPR Compliance:** Data443’s WordPress GDPR Framework is already powering over 30,000 businesses worldwide, demonstrating a strong track record in GDPR compliance.

- **Support for Multiple Privacy Frameworks:** The platform supports CCPA, PIPEDA, and LGPD, among others, making it a versatile solution for organizations operating in multiple jurisdictions.

- **Industry-Leading ClassiDocs Technology:** ClassiDocs is an award-winning data classification and governance technology that supports various privacy regulations, ensuring that organizations can meet compliance requirements effectively.

- **Regular Updates for Evolving Laws:** The platform is designed to adapt to changing privacy laws, ensuring that organizations remain compliant as regulations evolve.

**3. User-Focused Security Recommendations:**

- **Leverage Automated Features:** Businesses should take full advantage of the platform’s automated workflows and data classification capabilities to streamline compliance and reduce manual effort.

- **Implement Consent Management Best Practices:** Organizations should use the customizable consent management features to ensure transparency and compliance, while also respecting customer preferences.

- **Utilize the Privacy Portal:** The privacy portal provides a seamless experience for customers to manage their privacy rights. Businesses should ensure that this feature is fully utilized to enhance customer trust and satisfaction.

- **Take Advantage of Early Adopter Programs:** The early adopters program offers a fully branded, customizable experience that allows businesses to test the platform’s capabilities and value proposition before full deployment.

- **Educate Customers and Employees:** Clear communication and education are key to ensuring that both customers and employees understand privacy rights and compliance requirements. Businesses should leverage the platform’s reporting and consent management features to facilitate this.

**4. Technical Security Implementation Details:**

- **SaaS-Only Deployment:** The Global Privacy Manager is a cloud-based SaaS solution that can be deployed in minutes, reducing the complexity and time associated with on-premise deployments.

- **Integration with Existing Systems:** The platform integrates with cloud applications, databases, servers, and endpoints, ensuring comprehensive data discovery and classification across the entire organization.

- **Scalability:** The platform is designed to handle businesses of all sizes, from small retailers to large enterprises, ensuring that scalability is not an issue.

- **Architecture:** The architecture is built to automatically discover and classify data, map privacy data, and provide reporting, ensuring a seamless experience for both businesses and their customers.

- **ClassiDocs Integration:** The integration with ClassiDocs enhances the platform’s data classification and governance capabilities, ensuring accurate and efficient data management.

**5. Data Protection Measures:**

- **Data Classification:** The platform’s ability to classify data ensures that sensitive information is identified and protected appropriately, reducing the risk of unauthorized access or disclosure.

- **Consent Management:** Customizable consent management ensures that customer preferences are respected, reducing the risk of non-compliance with privacy regulations.

- **Access Controls:** The privacy portal provides customers with direct access to manage their privacy rights, while ensuring that businesses can control and audit access to sensitive data.

- **Encryption:** While not explicitly mentioned, the integration with ARALOC, a secure, cloud-based platform for content management, suggests that encryption is part of the data protection measures.

- **Audit Logging:** The platform’s ability to provide reporting and audit trails ensures that businesses can demonstrate compliance and track data access and changes.

- **Data Anonymization:** The platform’s focus on privacy and compliance suggests that data anonymization techniques may be employed to protect sensitive information.

**6. Best Practices for End Users:**

- **Implement Privacy by Design:** Businesses should adopt a privacy-by-design approach, integrating privacy considerations into every aspect of their operations, from product development to customer engagement.

- **Regularly Audit and Update Compliance Practices:** Organizations should periodically review and update their privacy policies and practices to ensure ongoing compliance with evolving regulations.

- **Educate Employees:** Provide regular training to employees on privacy best practices, ensuring that everyone understands their role in maintaining compliance and protecting sensitive data.

- **Monitor for Breaches:** Continuously monitor for potential data breaches and have an incident response plan in place to address any security incidents promptly.

- **Engage with Customers:** Use the privacy portal and consent management features to engage with customers, providing clear information about their privacy rights and how their data is used.

- **Leverage Technology:** Take full advantage of the platform’s automated features and integrations to streamline compliance, reduce manual effort, and enhance data protection.

By following these best practices and leveraging the robust features of Data443’s Global Privacy Manager, businesses can ensure compliance with privacy regulations, protect sensitive data, and build trust with their customers.
